name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Shimmer Body Oil with Vitamin E, 5.1 Fl Oz, Radiance Body Oil for Glowing Skin, Enhances Dark Tones & Tans, Hydrating
short_description: Ready, Set, Glow: Palmer's Shimmer Radiance Body Oil amplifies skin's deep, rich tone and tan. A body shimmer that provides a gorgeous lit-from-within golden glow. Get your glow up and illuminate skin with our shimmer oil

Moisturizing Body Oil: Formulated with Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E, this vegan-friendly shimmering body oil provides 48-hour moisture. A rich, luxuriously hydrating addition to your body skin care products for a radiant body glow

Instant Illumination: Radiance body glow shimmer creates filter-flawless skin with a pigmented blend of skin-shimmering pearls, blurring imperfections and catching gorgeous light. This body glow oil is ideal for adding a kiss of radiance to the skin

Skin-Friendly Formula: Palmers cocoa butter skin glowing products are cruelty-free and feature real plant-based ingredients. Our deeply nourishing body shimmer oil is free from parabens & phthalates, promoting a healthier body and skin care routine

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish & revitalize the face, body, skin & hair
product_description: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Shimmer Radiance Body OilStep into the spotlight with Palmer's Shimmering Radiance Body Oil, your new go-to body shimmer oil. This deeply nourishing body oil is perfect for creating radiant, glowing skin. Formulated with Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E, it provides a boost in hydration while giving an overall glow. This body oil amplifies your skin's deep and rich tonality, enhancing dark tones and tans.Use our dermatologist approved glow oil as a body oil after a shower, for a healthy-looking shimmer. Simply shake and apply for a boost in hydration and overall glow. This shimmering body oil is cruelty-free, vegan friendly and free from Mineral oil, Phthalates, Dyes and Parabens.Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation. Whether you're looking for a cocoa radiant body oil, or simply a shimmering body oil to enhance your tan, this product has it all. Use Palmer's glow body oil and enjoy 48-hours of moisture, with skin that shimmers and glows like never before. Great for flaunting summer skin, holiday events, nights out or vacation ready moments!

short_description: REVITALIZE AND NOURISH: This essential mix of natural ingredients will moisturize and protect dry skin to keep it glowing throughout the day.
HYDRATING COCONUT OIL MASSAGE: Our blend is perfect for a relaxing coconut oil massage. This intense hydration formula contains iron and fatty acids which aid in restoring natural oil
SMOOTHER AND SOFTER WITH HIBISCUS FLOWER: Hibiscus Flower extracts have emollient properties which soothe dry skin and make your skin look younger.
NATURAL OILS TO PAMPER SKIN: Our Shea Moisture Oil is enriched with Vitamin E, Jojoba Oil, and other natural ingredients to rejuvenate and restore skin tone.
PARABEN-FREE SKIN CARE: Our paraben-free products provide natural support for skin that glows provide natural moisture for radiant skin that glows.
product_description: Because You Deserve It Enriching coconut oil loaded with Vitamin K and E combined with organic butter hydrate and restore skin after it has been exposed to the elements. Fragrant hibiscus flower extracts ensure that the skin is nourished and soothed with skin toned restored. The combination of these natural ingredients work well to restore and hydrate dry skin while leave a protective layer to prevent further damage. Just sit back and pamper yourself with this rejuvenating bath, body and massage oil and feel invigorated. The Goodness Of Coconut Coconut Oil is rich in essential vitamins including K and E which nourish dry skin by penetrating beneath the superficial layer. Vitamins E and K, prevalent in all natural coconut oil ensure your skin is hydrated and protected at all times. The Hibiscus Touch Hibiscus flower extracts give the skin the nutrition and restoration it needs. This magical ingredient restores skin tone, sooths dry skin and leaves you feeling fragrant with a calming effect on your senses. Promise Of SheaMoisture SAFE AND UNCOMPROMISING BEAUTY. We are natural, organic, sustainably-produced goodness. Made with love for you and your body. Pioneering fair trade through Community Commerce at home and abroad. We strive to be sulfate free, paraben free and more, whenever possible. Tested on our family for four generations. Never on animals.

short_description: Fast-absorbing body oil that helps firm, moisturize, and nourish the skin
Features the signature warm, tropical Tropic Glow scent with notes of almond, golden amber, and Australian sandalwood
Enriched with Cupuaçu Butter, Guarana Extract, and Pistachio Seed Oil for a glow-enhancing moisture boost
Includes a replenishing blend of apricot, acai, and geranium oils to help leave skin feeling soft and supple
Lightweight, non-greasy formula ideal for daily hydration or post-shower use
product_description: Enhance your glow with Tree Hut Tropic Glow Firming Body Oil, a luxurious, fast-absorbing oil designed to leave your skin feeling smooth, firm, and deeply nourished. Tropic Glow is one of Tree Hut’s most loved scents, blending almond, golden amber, and Australian sandalwood to evoke the warmth of sunlit skin and long summer days. Formulated with Cupuaçu Butter, Guarana Extract, and Pistachio Seed Oil, this body oil delivers a moisture surge that supports skin's elasticity and adds a subtle, healthy-looking radiance. A blend of apricot, acai, and geranium oils helps soften the skin without feeling heavy or greasy, making it perfect for daily use or as part of your post-shower ritual. Tropic Glow Firming Body Oil complements your self-care routine with a scent that fans adore and a texture that melts effortlessly into the skin. Layer with other Tree Hut Tropic Glow products for lasting fragrance and a pampered finish. This is your glow ritual, reimagined.

name: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Dry Body Oil Mist with Oat & Jojoba Oil for Dry, Rough, Sensitive Skin, Lightweight, Non-Greasy, Body Spray, Paraben, Silicone & Phthalate-Free, 6.7 fl oz
short_description: Moisturizing body oil: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Dry Body Oil Mist blends oat & jojoba oil enriched with vitamin E to moisturize & condition dry, rough, sensitive skin. lightweight, fast-absorbing formula delivers daily hydration

Hypoallergenic dermatologist recommended brand: 98% naturally derived ingredients provide gentle, non-irritating care; free of parabens, phthalates, silicones, mineral oil, synthetic dyes & drying alcohol

Convenient spray application: Oil mist delivers even coverage; spray body oil close to skin & massage in for a non-greasy, quick-absorbing finish, making it ideal as part of your daily body care routine

Boosts skin’s smoothness & more even: 92% agree their skin looks smoother & more even after application; Ideal for sensitive skin care, this body oil spray immediately moisturizes dry, rough, sensitive skin
Nourishing oat & jojoba oil: Oat oil rich in lipids & fatty acids helps condition skin, while jojoba oil delivers twice the vitamin E of shea butter for smoother and more even skin every day
product_description: A dermatologist recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Dry Oil Mist is a lightweight body oil designed to nourish and condition dry, rough, and sensitive skin while promoting healthy-looking skin. This convenient 6.7 fl oz spray blends 98% naturally derived ingredients to deliver the ease of a mist with the comforting nourishment of a body spray oil. The formula includes oat oil, which is rich in lipids & fatty acids to help condition skin, jojoba oil that contains twice as much vitamin E as shea butter, helping soften elbows, knees, and heels and support the skin’s moisture barrier for smoother, more even-looking skin. In consumer testing, 92% agree their skin instantly looks smoother and more even after application. Hypoallergenic and free of parabens, phthalates, silicones, mineral oil, synthetic dyes, and alcohol, it fits seamlessly into your daily body care & beauty routines. For best results, mist onto damp, clean skin after showering, spray close to skin, avoid eyes and face & massage in circular motions until fully absorbed; wait 30–60 seconds before dressing to help prevent transfer to fabrics. Use in the morning for a dewy glow, before bed to lock in moisture, or anytime skin needs a quick refresh. Once absorbed, the dry oil offers a comfortable, non-greasy feel & layers well under lotion or fragrance.

Pure baby mineral oil forms a silky moisturizing barrier to help prevent excess moisture loss and lock in up to 10 times more moisture on wet skin than an ordinary lotion can on dry skin

The pure mineral baby oil, enriched with shea and cocoa butter, locks in up to 10 times more moisture *on wet skin than an ordinary lotion can on dry skin. To use, gently massage baby oil onto damp skin after bathing to leave skin feeling baby soft. Works best on damp, not dry skin.

name: Instituto Español Rosa Body Oil, Smoothness for your Skin, 2-Pack, 8.5 FL Oz each, 2 Bottles
short_description: Rose oil helps to regenerate your skin, is very useful in delaying the signs of aging due to its extraordinary moisturizing and regenerating effect.
Rose oil has an excellent role in skincare. Our oil is very effective in softening elbows, knees, as well as the soles of the feet, as it helps to moisturize and restore the elasticity of the skin.
Rosa Hydrating Body Oil is made to soften your skin and hydrate it due to its deep absorption. It will take care of your skin, leaving a pleasant and subtle scent of roses.
Thanks to our oil properties, it is possible to use it on babies' delicate skin without damaging it. Rosa Body Oil is soft enough so that you can use it all over their body, hydrating it.

Indulge your skin and senses with our nourishing body oil, which transforms a dull, dry complexion into soft and silky skin. Promotes youthful skin by helping the appearance of scars and excessive dryness.
product_description: Instituto Español has created Rosa moisturizing body oil, made with a rose base to make your skin soft. Our oil is a great product; it will help you regeneration the cell membrane and renew skin tissues. It will also help you prevent and attenuates premature aging of the skin, softening and hydrating your body; our product will also help you restore your skin elasticity. Roses body oil will keep your skin soft, nourished, helping it look healthier and younger. Our product is ideal for dry and delicate skin, including baby skin! Healthy skin is beautiful skin, a reflection of self-care inside and out; it is discovering your natural beauty at its best. Rosa body oil profoundly hydrates your skin, giving you an incredible feeling of softness throughout the day; its fragrance is subtle and pleasant. It can be added to homemade balms, exfoliators, or creams. You can also use it as a cleanser or facial make-up remover. You can use it, spreading it all over your body after showering with damp skin, or add two caps with rose oil to the bathtub with warm water. You will enjoy its relaxing and delicate aroma. Your skin will be soft and hydrated, ready to enjoy the day or rest at night!

short_description: Summer-in-a-Bottle Skin: Pamper skin with this Brazilian Coco firming oil & achieve visibly firmer & tighter skin in as little as 2 weeks. This skin tightening oil features curve-hugging formula that provides intense hydration and helps firm skin

Nourishing Body Oil: Crafted with Coconut Oil & Vitamin E, this skin firming oil provides 48hr moisture. Brazil Nut, Guarana, Acai, Green Coffee, Peptides, Tahitian Monoi, Seaweed, Hyaluronic Acid, Sweet Almond, Argan & Olive Oils help firm & tone skin

Visible Firming Effect:This body firming oil targets key areas like the bum, bust, arms, thighs and stomach. It is designed to help tone skin, helping reduce the appearance of cellulite or dimpled skin for visibly smoother skin

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Choose What's Real: Our nourishing skin care and hair care products feature real, high-quality, plant-based ingredients. Our product line for whole body care includes body butter, creams, balms, lotions, oils, soaps, pregnancy and stretch mark care

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish & revitalize the face, body, skin & hair
product_description: Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula Brazilian Coco Firming Oil with Vitamin E Experience visibly firmer, summer-in-a-bottle skin with Palmer’s Brazilian Coco Firming Oil! This luxurious skin tightening oil is formulated with a blend of coconut, brazil nut, guarana, acai, sweet almond oil, green coffee, argan oil, peptides, tahitian monoi, olive oil, seaweed, hyaluronic acid to deliver deep hydration and visibly firmer skin in as little as 2 weeks. The indulgent, smooth texture effortlessly glides over your skin, providing a pampering experience while enhancing skin firmness and texture. Suitable for bums, busts, bellies and more, this body oil helps tighten and tone problem areas, promoting a smoother appearance. It offers 48-hour moisture, keeping your skin hydrated, soft and radiant. Vegan and not tested on animals, Palmer’s Brazilian Coco Firming Oil is also formulated without parabens, phthalates, mineral oil and dyes. Transform your body care routine with this body-firming and tightening oil, and envelop yourself in a tropical, summery scent that leaves your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized. Get ready to step into summer! Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation.
